label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_004
content:
## 2026-01-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /storage/cluster_capacity: REQUESTS 120 req | p50: 15ms p95: 45ms p99: 60ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

- /storage/rebalance: REQUESTS 110 req | p50: 20ms p95: 55ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

- /storage/metadata: REQUESTS 75 req | p50: 19ms p95: 48ms p99: 65ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /storage/maintenance: REQUESTS 70 req | p50: 9ms p95: 28ms p99: 40ms | err: 0.0% (0 errors) | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-17: CPU 66% | Mem 76% | Disk Used 94% | Conns: 120 | Net: 6.8/6.0 Mbps
- stor-b-09: CPU 58% | Mem 65% | Disk Used 90% | Conns: 110 | Net: 5.5/4.9 Mbps
- stor-c-11: CPU 60% | Mem 70% | Disk Used 88% | Conns: 105 | Net: 5.2/4.8 Mbps
- meta-02: CPU 49% | Mem 82% | Disk Used 76% | Conns: 95 | Net: 2.2/2.1 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-storage: active 45 | idle 10 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 60 | avg_wait 12ms
- pool-db: active 30 | idle 15 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 8ms
- pool-cache: active 20 | idle 25 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 5ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92% | Bandwidth: 3.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1500

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] disk_failure on stor-a-17: 1 failure
- [WARNING] node_unhealthy on stor-b-09: 2 unhealthy OSDs
- [ERROR] scrub_errors on storage cluster: 11 errors
- [INFO] disk_rebuilds completed: 2 disks
- [INFO] node_restarts: 1
- [WARNING] network_drops: 8
- [INFO] firmware_updates: 3 applied
- [INFO] rack_power_cycles: 1

### Deployments & Changes
- Rebalance jobs: 6 started and completed; moved 244 TB at 830 Mbps; queue depth 3; skew index 1.14
- Rebalance completed; data moved 244 TB
- Firmware updates applied to three drive controllers
- Rack R07 power cycle for PDU maintenance; validated node auto-rejoin
- Restore drill: 2 TB dataset restored; RTO 49 min
- Scrub errors: 11 detected during maintenance

### Events
- Completed rebuilds for two previously failed disks; confirmed placement groups fully backfilled and scrubbed clean
- Performed restore drill for compliance: restored 2 TB sample dataset into isolated namespace; achieved 49-minute RTO within SLO
- Rack R07 had a planned power cycle for PDU maintenance; validated node auto-rejoin and no lingering under-replicated objects
- Firmware updates applied to three drive controllers; monitored for post-update error bursts (none observed)

### On-Call
- Shift: Elena V. 2 pages. 6 tickets. Status: Stable; restore drill successful, utilization still climbing—capacity forecast updated and procurement request drafted
